body:
I mean I'm fine in theory with adding a code of conduct (certainly people should be behaving with respect whether it's in a text document or not), but this one appears to be mostly targeted at conferences (with references to sponsors and a random @yahoo contact email).

On October 21, 2017 7:11:17 AM EDT, "Jeremias S. Manacap" <notifications@github.com> wrote:
>Java Script
